attr.title: Basic Biking
attr.desc: Push the buttons (left and right arrow key) to somehow pedal the bike. The game resets if you hit your head or reach the goal.
attr.inst: Download the Linux game free from ottoojala.com (https://ottoojala.com), extract, and copy basicbiking.pck to the port's folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the **Linux** game free from [ottoojala.com](https://ottoojala.com), extract, and copy `basicbiking.pck` to the port's folder.
